common.allDataCleared: All saved data has been cleared

home.title: OldWeb Tools
home.subtitle: Fast, simple, offline-ready utilities for network engineers and system administrators

quickAccessModal.title: Customize Quick Access
quickAccessModal.description: Select up to 8 tools to appear in your Quick Access section.

home.footer: OldWeb Tools - Works offline, no installation required

network.title: Network Tools
network.subtitle: Fast, reliable networking utilities for planning, calculation, and troubleshooting
network.description: IP and subnet calculators, CIDR converters, and network planning utilities for network engineers.
network.toolList: Subnet Calculator • IPv6 Subnet Calculator • Subnet Planner • CIDR Converter • Bit Calculator • Data Transfer Calculator

system.title: System Tools
system.subtitle: Unix/Linux system administration utilities
system.description: Unix/Linux system administration utilities including permissions, cron scheduling, disk planning, and log analysis.
system.toolList: Chmod Calculator • Cron Builder • DISK Tools • Password Generator • Regex Tester • Log Timestamp Converter

data.title: Data Tools
data.subtitle: Data encoding and format conversion utilities
data.description: Data encoding, hashing, and format conversion utilities for developers and security professionals.

financials.title: Financial Tools
financials.subtitle: Financial calculators and planning tools
financials.description: Loan and mortgage calculators for financial planning, payment schedules, and interest analysis.

productivity.title: Productivity Tools
productivity.subtitle: Time management and focus utilities
productivity.description: Time management and focus utilities to help you stay productive and organized.

subnetCalculator.title: IPv4 Subnet Calculator
subnetCalculator.name: Subnet Calculator
subnetCalculator.description: Calculate IPv4 network addresses, broadcast addresses, host ranges, and subnet details from IP/CIDR notation. Includes binary representation and subnet list visualization.
subnetCalculator.ipAddressHelp: Enter an IPv4 address in dotted decimal notation
subnetCalculator.cidrHelp: Select the CIDR prefix length or subnet mask for your network
subnetCalculator.invalidIP: Please enter a valid IPv4 address (e.g., 192.168.1.100)
subnetCalculator.resultsAnnounce: Subnet calculation complete. Network address is {{network}} slash {{cidr}}. {{hosts}} usable hosts.
subnetCalculator.footer: Subnet Calculator - Works offline, no installation required

subnetCalculatorIPv6.title: IPv6 Subnet Calculator
subnetCalculatorIPv6.name: IPv6 Subnet Calculator
subnetCalculatorIPv6.description: Calculate IPv6 network addresses, prefix information, and address ranges. Full support for IPv6 CIDR notation and address compression.

subnetPlanner.title: Subnet Planner
subnetPlanner.name: Subnet Planner
subnetPlanner.description: Plan and visualize subnetting schemes for IPv4 networks. Design hierarchical subnets, calculate required subnet sizes, and generate subnet lists with detailed information.
subnetPlanner.quickTemplates: Quick Templates - Load a Pre-configured Site Layout:
subnetPlanner.label: Label

subnetPlannerIPv6.title: IPv6 Subnet Planner
subnetPlannerIPv6.name: IPv6 Subnet Planner
subnetPlannerIPv6.description: Plan and visualize IPv6 subnet allocations with support for massive address spaces. Design hierarchical /64 subnets, assign VLANs, and export plans to CSV or JSON.
subnetPlannerIPv6.quickTemplates: Quick Templates - Load a Pre-configured Site Layout:
subnetPlannerIPv6.label: Label

cidrConverter.title: CIDR Notation Converter
cidrConverter.name: CIDR Convert
cidrConverter.description: Convert CIDR notation to IP ranges, detect overlaps between multiple networks, and convert IP ranges back to CIDR notation. Supports standard CIDR, subnet mask, and Cisco wildcard formats.

bitCalculator.title: Bit Calculator
bitCalculator.name: Bit Calc
bitCalculator.description: Convert between bits, bytes, and larger units (KB, MB, GB, TB, etc.) with support for both legacy and IEEE notation. Perfect for network bandwidth and storage calculations.

dataRateCalculator.title: Data Transfer Calculator
dataRateCalculator.name: Data-Rate Calc
dataRateCalculator.description: Calculate how long it takes to transfer data based on file size and transfer rate. Supports various units and displays results in seconds, minutes, hours, days, and weeks.

mtuCalculator.title: MTU Calculator
mtuCalculator.name: MTU Calc
mtuCalculator.description: Calculate Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) and Maximum Segment Size (MSS) with protocol overhead analysis.

jinjaBuilder.title: Jinja Template Builder
jinjaBuilder.name: Jinja Builder
jinjaBuilder.description: Build and test Jinja2 templates with syntax highlighting. Pre-built templates for network configs, Ansible playbooks, Docker Compose, and system configurations with live preview.

regexTester.title: Regex Tester
regexTester.name: Regex
regexTester.description: Test and debug regular expressions with real-time matching, syntax highlighting, and match information.

timestampConverter.title: Timestamp Converter
timestampConverter.name: Timestamp Convert
timestampConverter.description: Convert between Unix timestamps, ISO 8601, and human-readable date formats. Supports multiple timezones.

diskTools.title: Disk Tools
diskTools.name: Disk Tools
diskTools.description: RAID calculator, disk space estimator, and storage planning utilities.

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.name: Password Gen
passwordGenerator.description: Generate secure random passwords with customizable length and character sets. Strong password generation for system administrators.
passwordGenerator.passwordLengthHelp: Adjust password length from 4 to 128 characters
passwordGenerator.excludeHelp: Enter characters to exclude from password generation
passwordGenerator.securityNote: Passwords are generated entirely in your browser using the Web Crypto API. Nothing is sent to any server.
passwordGenerator.noCharTypes: Please select at least one character type
passwordGenerator.footer: Password Generator - Works offline, no installation required

passphraseGenerator.title: Passphrase Generator
passphraseGenerator.name: Passphrase Generator
passphraseGenerator.description: Generate secure XKCD-style passphrases using random dictionary words.
passphraseGenerator.infoText: XKCD-style passphrases use random common words. They're easier to remember and type while still being secure.
passphraseGenerator.wordCountHelp: Enter number of words in passphrase, between 3 and 12
passphraseGenerator.separatorHelp: Select character to separate words in passphrase
passphraseGenerator.quantityHelp: Enter number of passphrases to generate, between 1 and 100

certificateParser.title: Certificate Parser
certificateParser.name: Certificate Parse
certificateParser.description: Parse and analyze X.509 certificates, display certificate details, and verify certificate chains.

cronBuilder.title: Cron Expression Builder
cronBuilder.name: Cron
cronBuilder.description: Build and validate cron expressions with a visual editor. Preview scheduled execution times.

chmodCalculator.title: Chmod Calculator
chmodCalculator.name: Chmod
chmodCalculator.description: Convert between symbolic and octal Unix file permissions. Visualize permission settings.
chmodCalculator.subtitle: Visual Unix file permissions calculator

reference.title: Octal Reference
reference.symbolicExample: Symbolic: -rwxr-xr-- = File type + Owner(rwx) + Group(r-x) + Other(r--)

umask.title: Umask Calculator
umask.description: Calculate default file and directory permissions based on umask value.

base64Hash.title: Base64 & Hash Tools
base64Hash.name: Base64/Hash
base64Hash.description: Encode/decode Base64 and generate cryptographic hashes (MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256, SHA-512).
base64Hash.subtitle: Encoding, decoding, and cryptographic hash generation

placeholders.inputText: Enter text to encode, decode, or hash...

stringTools.title: String Manipulation Toolkit
stringTools.name: String Tools
stringTools.description: Case conversion, character counting, and text manipulation utilities.
stringTools.subtitle: Case conversion, line operations, and text utilities

placeholders.escapeInput: Enter text to escape or unescape...

textDiff.title: Text Diff
textDiff.name: Text Diff(Compare)
textDiff.description: Compare two text inputs and highlight differences with side-by-side or inline views.
textDiff.subtitle: Compare text and highlight differences

uuidGenerator.title: UUID Generator
uuidGenerator.name: UUID Gen
uuidGenerator.description: Generate random UUIDs (v4) and validate UUID format.
uuidGenerator.subtitle: Generate and validate universally unique identifiers

measurementConverter.title: Measurement Converter
measurementConverter.name: Measurement Convert
measurementConverter.description: Convert between length, weight, volume, and temperature units.
measurementConverter.subtitle: Convert between common measurement units

amortizationCalculator.name: Amortization
amortizationCalculator.description: Calculate loan payments, view amortization schedules, and analyze interest vs principal over time.

formulas.monthlyPaymentDesc: Calculate monthly principal and interest payment
formulas.totalInterestDesc: Calculate total interest over the life of the loan
formulas.remainingBalanceDesc: Calculate how much you still owe after a number of payments
formulas.interestPortionDesc: Calculate interest portion of a specific payment
formulas.principalPortionDesc: Calculate principal portion of a specific payment
